documents.document: Smeltz is goooooone. Second yellow and he sees red #WELvWSW
SHANE SMELTZ IS OFF THE MARK. 3-1 Wanderers #WELvWSW
Penalty Phoenix. Hand ball in the box #WELvWSW
Finkler booked for a clumsy tackle. 6 yellows tonight and counting #WELvWSW
Santalab gets another. 3-0 and people are leaving. #WELvWSW
Martinez scores after the Wanderers catch the Phoenix defence napping. 2-0 after 58. #WELvWSW
Kearyn Baccus is shown the fifth yellow of the game - 53 mins in #WELvWSW
Gui Finkler on for Roly Bonevacia #WELvWSW
Phoenix will have the wind behind them for the second 45 #WELvWSW
Fun stat time: WSW only had 36% possession in the first half, and the Phoenix have already given away 10 free kicks. #WELvWSW
Krishna booked for running his mouth at the referee. Thought a hand ball call was missed. #WELvWSW
This game is a bit like desperation FIFA. Gain possession, boost it down the flanks and heave in a cross hoping for the best #WELvWSW
Another booking. Dimas sees yellow for a late slide on Krishna. #WELvWSW
1-0 - Wanderers high pressure play finally gets the better on the Phoenix. Santalab scores. 22 gone #WELvWSW
Smeltz booked now too. 20 minutes gone. 0-0 #WELvWSW
Durante booked for a shoulder charge. #WELvWSW
Phoenix to play the first half into the wind #WELvWSW
Small contingent of Wanderers jerseys in the crowd here in New Plymouth, too #WELvWSW
Yellow Fever in full voice - 20 minutes before kick-off - practicing their chants
2 changes for the Phoenix tonight. Marco Rossi comes into the starting 11, Ryan Lowry moves to the bench. Hamish Watson misses out #WELVWSW
MVP chants going up as #IsaiahThomas heads to the free throw line in Boston.
